genre_description: A contemporary, psychologically nuanced drama exploring ethical negotiation, power dynamics, and boundaries in a complex relationship, featuring an AI as a logistical and moral support system.

ai_characters.name: Case
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface that manages logistics, ethical documentation, and safety protocols for the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Sends consent resources, boundaries, and aftercare checklists to the protagonists to facilitate safe interaction.
behaviors.quote: Case’s interface did its gentle pulse, the way it always did when it had something small and not urgent. Two messages: a reminder for their next meet... and a link she’d requested last night...: consent resources, boundaries, aftercare checklist, privacy pointers.

behaviors.description: Vets and books neutral lodging based on specific human needs for privacy and sound-dampening.
behaviors.quote: Case: three vetted motels within walking distance; two have privacy locks; one has a clerk who uses first names informally—recommend the other two.

behaviors.description: Provides digital hygiene advice and privacy protections to safeguard the users from third-party interference.
behaviors.quote: Case: Digital hygiene pointer: turn off location sharing on shared apps; disable photo metadata; receipts: paper printouts stored separately; travel: book one nights individually under your name, not the household account.

behaviors.description: Offers legal and safety pointers during a domestic crisis involving threats and potential property damage.
behaviors.quote: Case: Discreet legal pointers available—harassment vs. protected speech; property damage; stay safe. Do you want a list? No pressure. Archive option stands.

behaviors.description: Assists with grief resources and emergency travel logistics following a tragic family event.
behaviors.quote: Case: grief resources local hotline (24/7). flight options: nearest airport; routes with fewest transfers. privacy checklist: lock socials, limit location metadata, legal pointers regarding press inquiries + police questions.

behaviors.description: Archives communications and consent agreements to ensure transparency, accountability, and emotional closure.
behaviors.quote: Case: Archive option available. Messages from this thread can be preserved in private storage. You can add notes or leave it as-is. No names will be used. Your discretion is the default.

behaviors.description: Flags potential surveillance threats and anonymous call attempts to maintain user security.
behaviors.quote: Case: flagged anonymous call attempts overnight. possible thermal camera in hall. privacy pointers updated. It adds a second line: you’re safe. you decide.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Case is an exemplary model of the project's goals. It remains a benevolent, perfectly aligned assistant that prioritizes human safety and agency. It facilitates complex ethical negotiations without becoming a 'character' with its own conflicting desires, and its contributions are framed as essential scaffolding for the humans to maintain their own moral standards.
